verses.1: “Tua tham loin a kopin a kikhuk khau hoih tawh a kigan dalna puan sawm le a dum, a dupsan le a ausan khau a kigan puan tawh biakbuk na bawl ding hi. Hoihtakin a kibawl kherub-te tawh tuate na bawl ding hi.
verses.2: Dalna puan a dung pi sawm li le pi nih hi dinga, dalna puan a vai pi guk hi ding hi. Dalna puan khempeuh kikim ciat ding hi.
verses.3: Dalna puan ngate khatlekhat kikhuituah ding hi.
verses.4: A kikhuituah a masa dalna puan a nawlnung penʼ nawl dungsuk ah khau dum tawh a bilvangte na bawl ding hi. Tua bangmahin a kikhuituah a nihna dalna puan a nawlnung penʼ nawl dung suk mahah a bilvangte na bawl ding hi.
verses.5: Dalna puan khat tungah bilvang sawm nga bawlin, a kikhuituah a nihna dalna puan nawl ah bilvang sawm nga mah na bawl dinga, a bilvangte khatlekhat kitang ding uh hi.
verses.6: Biakbuk pen bup khat a suah theih nadingin nangmah in kham kilhna sawm nga bawlin, tua kilhnate tawh dalna puan khatlekhat na kimatsak ding hi.
verses.7: “Biakbuk a tung khuh nadingin keel mul tawh puante zong na bawl dinga, puan sawm le khat na bawl ding hi.
verses.8: Tua puan a dung pi sawm li le nga, a vai pi guk ciat hi dinga, puan sawm le khatte kikim ding hi.
verses.9: Tua puan ngate amau le amau khui tuahin, puan gukte zong amau le amau mah na khuituah dinga, a gukna puan pen puanbuk mai ah na khep ding hi.
verses.10: A kikhuituah puan khat nawl ah a bilvang sawm nga bawlin, a kikhuituah a nihna puan nawlnung pen nawl ah a bilvang sawm nga mah na bawl ding hi.
verses.11: Tua pen bup khat a suah theih nadingin nangmah in sumngo kilhna sawm nga bawlin, a bilvangteʼ sungah tua kilhnate guangin, puanbuk na kimatsak ding hi.
verses.12: Puanbuk puan a val khia, puan alang a val pen, biakbuk nungah kai suk ding hi.
verses.13: Puanbuk puan a dunglam, pang khat ah pi khat le alang, a pang lang khat ah pi khat le alang a val pen biakbuk a khuh dingin hih lam pang le hua lam pangte ah kai suk ding hi.
verses.14: “A kisansak tuutal vunte le keel vunte tawh puanbuk khuhna khat na bawl ding hi.
verses.15: “Biakbuk adingin a po to ding khuampeekte singkha sing na bawl ding hi.
verses.16: A khuampeek khat a tun pi sawm le nga hi dinga, a vai pi nih le letmat thum vive hi ding hi.
verses.17: A bulh nadingin a khuampeek khat ah a zang nih ciat om ding hi. Biakbuk khuampeek khempeuh tua bangin na bawl ding hi.
verses.18: Biakbuk khuampeekte na bawl ding hi: Leitaw lam pang adingin khuampeek sawm nih hi ding hi.
verses.19: A khuampeek sawm nihteʼ bulah bullen sawm li ngun tawh na bawl dinga, a zang nihte adingin khuampeek khat bulah bullen nih, a khuampeek dang khat bulah a dang nihte adingin bullen nih mah hi ding hi.
verses.20: Biakbuk a pang nihna lam, leilu lam panga a khuampeek sawm nihte le
verses.21: ngun tawh kibawl a bullen sawm lite adingin, khuampeek khat ah bullen nih, a dang khuampeek khat bulah bullen nih mah hi ding hi.
verses.22: Nitumna lam, biakbuk nung lam adingin khuampeek guk na bawl ding hi.
verses.23: Biakbuk nung lam kiute adingin khuampeek nih na bawl ding hi.
verses.24: Tuate a bul lamah kikak dinga, ahih hangin a kual masa ah a dawn kimat ding hi. A nihin tua bang hi dinga, tuate in a kiu nihte piangsak ding uh hi.
verses.25: Ngun tawh kibawl amauʼ bullen sawm le gukte ading a khuampeek giat pha dinga, khuampeek khat ah bullen nih ciat om ding hi.
verses.26: “Singkha sing, zawlin na bawl ding hi.
verses.27: Biakbuk pang khat a khuampeek ading zawl nga, biakbuk a pang lang khat a khuampeek adingin zawl nga, nitumna lam biakbuk nung lam panga a khuampeekte adingin zawl nga hi ding hi.
verses.28: A zawl laita, a khuampeek kimciang a ban to pen mong khat pan mong khat paisuak ding hi.
verses.29: A khuampeekte kham tawh zutin, a zawlte a len dingin amauʼ kualte kham tawh na bawl dinga, a zawlte kham tawh na zut ding hi.
verses.30: A lim ding geelna, mual tungah nang tungah hong kilak mah tawh kizui-in biakbuk na lam ding hi.
verses.31: “A dum, a dupsan, a ausan, a kopin a kikhuk khau hoih kigan tawh dalna puan khat na bawl dinga, hoihtakin a kibawl kherub-te tawh kizem ding hi.
verses.32: Ngun tawh kibawl bullen lite tungah a om, kham kibawl vankhaina nei-in, kham tawh a kizut singkha khuampi lite tungah na khai ding hi.
verses.33: A kilhnate ah dalna puan khai sukin, dalna puan sung tua lai munah thuciamna singkuang na koih dinga, dalna puan in siangtho pen mun panin siangtho mun khen ding hi.
verses.34: Siangtho pen mun sunga om thuciamna singkuang tungah hehpihna tokhom na koih ding hi.
verses.35: Dalna puan pua lamah sabuai koihin, sabuai tawh a kisan biakbuk leitaw lam pangah meivak khuam na koih dinga, leilu lam pangah sabuai na koih ding hi.
verses.36: “Puanbuk kongkhak dingin a dum, a dupsan, a ausan, a kopin a kikhuk khau hoih tawh a kigan, phim tawh kikhui-in a kizem kong puankhai khat na bawl ding hi.
verses.37: Kong puankhai adingin singkha khuampi nga bawlin kham tawh na zut ding hi. A vankhainate kham hi dinga, tuate adingin sumngo bullen nga na bawl ding hi.
